org.javaconfig.api.Scope

    Package Description
    org.javaconfig.api  
    org.javaconfig.spi  

    • Uses of Scope in org.javaconfig.api

      Methods in org.javaconfig.api that return types with arguments of type Scope 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<Scope> ConfigService.getAvailableScopes()
      Access all currently active scopes.
      java.util.Collection<Scope> ConfigService.getDefinedScopes()
      Access all scopes.
      java.util.List<Scope> Aggregate.getScopes()
      Return the scopes aggregated in this instance, in the order of precedence (the first are the weekest).

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConfigurationNode ConfigService.getConfiguration(Scope scope)
